data.name: Pkcs11_UserTypeInvalid
data.value: Invalid user type for login. Ensure you are using the correct login type (user vs SO) and the device supports it.

data.name: Pkcs11_PinIncorrect
data.value: The provided PIN is incorrect. Retry or cancel. If you repeatedly enter an incorrect PIN the token may lock.

data.name: Pkcs11_PinLocked
data.value: The PIN is locked. Unlock or reset the PIN using SO (Security Officer) commands or vendor tools.

data.name: Pkcs11_UserAlreadyLoggedIn
data.value: User is already logged in. Possibly another session has authenticated. Try logging out other sessions or reusing the existing session.

data.name: Pkcs11_UserNotLoggedIn
data.value: User is not logged in. A login is required before performing this operation.

data.name: Pkcs11_UserPinNotInitialized
data.value: User PIN is not initialized. Initialize the PIN (often via SO) before attempting to login.

data.name: Pkcs11_DeviceError
data.value: Device reported an error. Check the hardware, drivers and vendor logs.
